name: Taylor Harmony Live
short_description: Taylor Harmony performs live, featuring her chart-topping hits and a pre-show by Rising Beats.
long_description: Join Taylor Harmony for an unforgettable night of pop music at the Sunset Arena. Featuring her latest hits and a pre-show performance by Rising Beats, this event promises an evening filled with energy, emotion, and musical excellence.
return_policy_specifics: Refundable up to 7 days before the event. No refunds afterward.
